articles.description: FA defends England kit over St George's Cross design saying "it is not the first time" different colours have been used
articles.title: FA defends new England kit over flag design

articles.description: Brazil face England at Wembley on Saturday, 23 March after a failed pursuit of Carlo Ancelotti led to a "lost year" and embarrassment.
articles.title: Brazil enter new era after 'lost year' and 'one of greatest humiliations'

articles.description: Mercedes team principal Toto Wolff says wife Susie "has always followed through on her convictions and values" after she began legal action against motorsport's governing body.
articles.title: F1: Toto Wolff backs wife Susie after she took legal action over conflict of interest inquiry

articles.description: Williams driver Alex Albon interrupts first practice at the Australian Grand Prix with a heavy crash.
articles.title: Lando Norris tops Australian GP practice as Alex Albon crashes

articles.description: The former Brazil international was convicted in Italy for his part in a gang rape in 2013.
articles.title: Former Brazil international Robinho arrested to serve rape sentence

articles.description: Malaysia rejects an offer to host the 2026 Commonwealth Games due to costs, the country's sports ministry says.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games 2026: Malaysia rejects offer to host due to costs

articles.description: Robert MacIntyre taunts his hosts in Florida by labelling his caddie's bib with Europe's Ryder Cup-winning score at the Valspar Championship.
articles.title: Valspar Championship: Robert MacIntyre adds Ryder Cup score to caddie's bib

articles.description: England's Andy Sullivan fires a 63 to take a share of the lead alongside compatriot Richard Mansell at the halfway point of the Singapore Classic.
articles.title: Singapore Classic: Andy Sullivan hits course-record 63 at DP World Tour event

articles.description: Rikke Sevecke tells BBC's Sportshour about her enforced retirement because of a heart condition.
articles.title: 'Dream US move found my heart condition but ended my career'

articles.description: Star player Giannis Antetokounmpo scores 21 points on his return from injury as the Milwaukee Bucks beat the Brooklyn Nets 115-108.
articles.title: NBA: Giannis Antetokounmpo makes injury return as Milwaukee Bucks beat Brooklyn Nets
